description.ko: 빛과 유리에 대한 연구로, 복잡한 기하학적 형태가 강렬한 굴절을 통해 빛을 근본적인 무지개 성분으로 분산시키는 모습을 담았습니다.
description.en: A study of light and glass, where a complex geometric form shatters light into its fundamental rainbow components through intense refraction.

prompt: A macro photography shot of a hyper-complex glass nautilus shell hit by a concentrated beam of white light, exploding into a web of #FF0080, #00FF80, and #8000FF spectral shards. Intense light dispersion, rainbow caustics, and #FFFF00 chromatic aberration at every crystal facet. 8k, hyper-realistic, raytracing. Sharp macro focus on the points where light splits into pure energy within a dark void, capturing the chaotic beauty of refraction.
